warnings: Social-media-derived items are marked unconfirmed and must not be treated as primary-source-confirmed material until an IR/SEC/filing is available.
Some news sources (Bloomberg, WSJ) may be paywalled; links provided are canonical.

GameStop names former retail exec to board as it shifts strategy

warnings: Social-media-sourced rumor; unconfirmed. Do not include as confirmed until corroborated by IR/SEC.
Twitter link may be removed or account-private; archive if needed.
items.title: Rumor: Major publisher negotiating exclusive content deal with GameStop
Retail investors pile into GME options ahead of potential strategic announcements
GameStop Stock Volatility Remains Elevated Amid Corporate Activity

top_catalysts: Strategic partnership announcements (e.g., cloud gaming tie-up) that could shift revenue/operating model.
Activist investor 13D filings and ensuing board/strategy pressure or governance changes.
Surges in options activity/retail flows that can drive short-term price volatility and market-structure events.
top_risks: Sentiment-driven volatility causing rapid price moves disconnected from fundamentals (market-structure risk).
Unconfirmed rumors or social-media narratives that may trigger speculative positioning without primary-source backing.
Potential governance battles or activist campaigns that could lead to strategic uncertainty or transaction risk.
